title: Spellcasting Ability
content: celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration Bard, Cleric, Arcana Domain, Druid, Wizard Seeming Lvl 5 Illusion ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot No Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m Bard, Sorcerer, Archfey, Wizard Telekinesis Lvl 5 Transmutation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Yes Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot.Heavier items deal more damage.10 Turns STR Save Concent
